tool_description: Manages physical and digital evidence related to workplace incidents, including photos, videos, documents, and physical evidence tracking.

incident_id.description: Unique identifier of the incident report

evidence_descriptions.description: Descriptions of each piece of evidence

error_messages: Array length mismatch: evidence_types and evidence_descriptions must have the same number of elements.
Invalid incident ID: Provide a valid incident_id that exists in the system.
Missing evidence description: Each evidence item must have a description of at least 10 characters.
Invalid file path: Ensure all file_paths point to accessible files.
Chain of custody error: Number of custody entries must match evidence count if provided.
Evidence type not recognized: Use valid evidence types (photo, video, document, physical, audio, other).
usage: Provide incident_id, evidence_types, and evidence_descriptions arrays with matching lengths. Optionally include file_paths for digital evidence, chain_of_custody personnel, and evidence_locations for physical items.

evidence_count.description: Total number of evidence items processed

digital_evidence_count.description: Number of digital evidence files attached

physical_evidence_count.description: Number of physical evidence items catalogued

evidence_inventory_id.description: Unique identifier for this evidence collection
